Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @

properties.name: AutoEnableMembers
properties.description: Indicates whether to automatically enable new organization accounts as member accounts in the organization behavior graph.

type.description: Indicates whether to automatically enable new organization accounts as member accounts in the organization behavior graph.
